projects.name: Travelling Website
projects.description: Developed a responsive and dynamic traveling website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing proficiency in front-end technologies. Implemented user-friendly interfaces and interactive features to enhance user experience and engagement. Implemented responsive web design with CSS media queries and flexible layouts, ensuring optimal cross-device compatibility and seamless user experience across desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

projects.name: Netflix-clone
projects.description: Netflix clone utilizes the MERN stack, consisting of MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, to handle the backend, frontend, and database functionalities. The clone implements a RESTful API architecture, enabling seamless communication between the frontend and backend components through HTTP requests. The clone is built using React.js, offering a responsive and interactive user interface, allowing for dynamic content loading and seamless navigation.

experiences.description: Developed a user-friendly interface for a Content Management Tool using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Developed a Video Conferencing Website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to facilitate real-time communication. Implemented responsive design techniques to ensure optimal viewing across devices, enhancing accessibility and usability.

Designed and developed a responsive portfolio website utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed and coded a Netflix-style landing page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Developed a fully functional calculator application utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to enhance user interaction and experience.
